nodes.text: Prior to the Age of the Galactic Empire, Sith Lord Darth Momin led a group of acolytes in his quest to satisfy the dark side of the Force. He utilized them, alongside resources inherited from his Master, Darth Shaa.
Momin's acolytes debuted in the 2018 canon comic Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 22 in a flashback. The comic was written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli.
